en-US.summary: Learn about a pokemon using Alexa. (Gen 1-7).
examplePhrases: Alexa ask Pokemon Pokedex what is Charmander
Alexa ask Pokemon Pokedex to tell me about Charmander
en-US.name: Unofficial Pokedex
en-US.description:
THIS SKILL HAS NO AFFILIATION WITH POKEMON COMPANY, GAMEFREAK, NINTENDO OR ANYONE INVOLVED WITH POKEMON
 Learn about Pokemon using Alexa. This skill works for generation 1 through 7 Pokemon. You can learn about things such as evolution chains and variations. At anytime, you can stop by saying "Alexa, stop"
